why-me.description: Analytical thinking, creativity and teamwork - finding solutions is what I love coding for. My focus is on clean code, performance, and delivering a great user experience. As a frontend developer, I enjoy turning designs into interactive and user-friendly interfaces.

skills.headline: I am currently learning
skills.description: I'm motivated to continuously improve my skills, explore new technologies, and build modern, user-friendly front-end solutions. I enjoy learning, staying up-to-date, and bringing fresh ideas into every project I work on.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.organization: How I have organized my work process

first.abouts: This app is a Kanban Project Management Tool. It streamlines task organization with drag-and-drop boards, real-time status updates, and a clean, intuitive interface for efficient team workflow.
first.organization: The code is organized into clear, modular functions with well-named variables and files. Logic and DOM manipulation are cleanly separated to keep the project maintainable and easy to understand.
first.groupwork: Our team consisted of three people. I was responsible for the homepage, the login and sign-up forms, and also supported my teammates with their tasks. We built the project using JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and Firebase, working closely together to achieve a consistent result.

second.abouts: This project is a self-made 2D game designed to explore and interact with world-class functionalities.
second.organization: The project focuses on modular design and clean architecture. Each component was carefully documented and tested to ensure maintainability.

third.abouts: This project is a Pokedex application, allowing users to browse and learn about various Pokémon with detailed stats and abilities. The focus was on communication with APIs.
third.organization: The project placed great emphasis on clean code practices, such as meaningful variable names and modular design.

references.headline: Need a teamplayer? Here's what my colleagues said about me
references.headline.secondline: Here's what my colleagues said about me

reference.first: Working with Lukasz was excellent. With creativity, expertise, and team spirit, he significantly contributed to the project's success.
reference.second: Collaborating with Lukasz was fantastic. With his expertise, solution-oriented approach, and helpfulness, he significantly contributed to the success and made the work enjoyable and productive.
reference.third: Lukasz impresses with his quick comprehension and enthusiasm for new topics. He doesn't shy away from going the extra mile and always supports his environment with positive energy and willingness to help.

contact.heading: Contact Me
contact.description: Feel free to get in touch with job offers or opportunities such as junior front-end developer, trainee, or web development roles. I'm excited to grow as a developer and contribute with clean, efficient code and a strong sense of teamwork
contact.privacy-label.end: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The information provided on this website is for general informational purposes only. While I strive to keep the content up to date and correct, I make no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, about the completeness, accuracy, reliability, suitability, or availability with respect to the website or the information, projects, or related graphics contained on the website for any purpose. Any reliance you place on such information is therefore strictly at your own risk.

external-links.title: External Links
external-links.content: This website contains links to external websites (e.g., GitHub, LinkedIn, and project demos) over which I have no control. Therefore, I cannot accept any responsibility for the content of these external websites. The responsibility for the linked pages lies solely with their operators.

copyright.title: Copyright
copyright.content: All content on this website, including text, images, and code, is protected by copyright. Unauthorized use, reproduction, or distribution of the material is prohibited without prior written permission.

content.start: Your personal data (e.g., your name or email address submitted through the contact form) will be handled confidentially and only used to respond to your inquiries. For more details, please refer to the

privacy-policy.headline: Privacy Policy
privacy-policy.intro: Protecting your personal data is very important to me. This Privacy Policy explains how I collect, use, and protect the information you provide while visiting this website.

data-controller.title: 1. Data Controller
data-controller.content: The data controller responsible for processing your personal data on this website is not included in this document.

data-collection.title: 2. Data Collection
data-collection.content: I may collect and process the following types of personal data:
data-collection.point-1: Your name and email address when you submit an inquiry through the contact form.
data-collection.point-2: Information about your use of this website (e.g., IP address, browser type, and access times) via cookies or analytics tools (if applicable).

data-processing-purpose.title: 3. Purpose of Data Processing
data-processing-purpose.content: Your data will be used for the following purposes:
data-processing-purpose.point-1: To respond to inquiries submitted via the contact form.
data-processing-purpose.point-2: To improve the functionality and user experience of this website.

legal-basis.title: 4. Legal Basis
legal-basis.content: The legal basis for processing your data is:
legal-basis.point-1: Your consent, provided when submitting the contact form.
legal-basis.point-2: Legitimate interests, to ensure the proper functioning of the website.

data-sharing.title: 5. Data Sharing
data-sharing.content: Your personal data will not be shared with third parties unless required by law or necessary for fulfilling your request (e.g., responding to inquiries). Any third parties that process your data will do so in compliance with data protection regulations.

cookies-analytics.title: 6. Cookies and Analytics
cookies-analytics.content-before-anchor: This website may use cookies to enhance user experience. Cookies are small text files stored on your device. You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but this may limit the functionality of the website.
cookies-analytics.analytics-content: If analytics tools are used, they collect anonymized data about website usage to improve user experience. No personally identifiable information is collected or processed.

data-retention.title: 7. Data Retention
data-retention.content: Your personal data will be retained only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy or as required by law.

your-rights.title: 8. Your Rights
your-rights.content: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
your-rights.point-2: Right to request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data.
your-rights.point-3: Right to request deletion of your data (“right to be forgotten”).
your-rights.point-4: Right to object to the processing of your data.
your-rights.point-5: Right to withdraw consent at any time.
your-rights.contact-instruction-before-anchor: To exercise these rights, please contact me at

policy-changes.title: 9. Changes to This Privacy Policy
policy-changes.content: I reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy as needed. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.content-before-anchor: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or your personal data, please contact me at

email-confirmation.thanks-message: Thanks for getting in touch - I'll reply as soon as I can.
email-confirmation.projects-message: Until then, why not take a look at my projects?
email-confirmation.countdown-message: Returning to main page in: {{ countdown }} seconds
